noisepp::utils::ThreadedJobQueue

noisepp::utils::ThreadedJobQueue Class Reference

#include <NoiseJobQueue.h>

Inheritance diagram for noisepp::utils::ThreadedJobQueue:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

You can add jobs to this queue which will be executed in several threads when you call the executeJobs() function.
